citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 p.m. on
03-Oct-16.
The inspector arrived at the facility and called the licensee. The licensee stated that he would not be available to
accompany the inspector within the next thirty minutes.

narrative:

accompany the inspector within the next thirty minutes.
